La caja destino debe ser diferente a la: The destination register must be different from the current one

La cantidad a bonificar debe ser menor q: The reward quantity must be less than the take quantity

Las cuotas se configuran en las formas d: Installments are configured in individual payment methods
Las escalas se evaluan en orden. Configu: Tiers are evaluated in order. Configure from lower to higher quantities.
Las formas de pago mixtas no tienen ajus: Mixed payment methods do not have their own adjustment. The adjustment is applied per each payment method used in the breakdown.
Las formas de pago mixtas no tienen cuot: Mixed payment methods do not have their own installments. Installments are configured in individual payment methods.
Las listas base aplican siempre a todos: Base lists always apply to all items without validity, condition or specific item restrictions.

If active, the group manages a single shared fund when opening a shift.
